-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Publisher............: Square Enix, Easy Interactive
Developer............: Core Design, Crystal Dynamics

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Overview:

Description (translated from the back cover):

A unique Tomb Raider Collection which consists of 9 parts (part 1 until part 8
and the Anniversary Edition). Help Lara Croft to solve all mysteries. Doors
have to be opened, levers have to be switched and secret corridors are there to
be discovered. Unfortunately, an adventure like this comes hand in hand with
dangers. That's why the sexy archaeologist is equipped with a pistol to kill
enemies.

Tomb Raider Bundle contains:

DISC1:

- Tomb Raider 1+2+3:

  - Tomb Raider (English)
  - Tomb Raider II: Golden Mask (English)
  - Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft (English)

- Tomb Raider 4+5:

  - Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation (English)
  - Tomb Raider: Chronicles (English)
  - Tomb Raider Editor

- Tomb Raider: Anniversary (English, French, German, Italian, Spanish)

DISC2:

- Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness (English)
- Tomb Raider: Legend (English, French, German, Italian, Spanish)

DISC3:

- Tomb Raider: Underworld (English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch)

DOX (extras):

Scans:

- High resolution scans of cover and discs

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Burn or mount the images in DAEMON Tools or Alcohol;
2. Install;
3. Play!

The versions of Tomb Raider 1+2+3, 4+5 and The Angel of Darkness included in
this edition are slightly modified Good Old Games versions. They work on
Windows XP/Vista/7.

All the games have the latest patches integrated and are DRM-free. The game
manuals are included on the discs.
